tweets.text:
Water quality in England has generally improved, but there‚Äôs still much to do.

@JamesBevanEA sets out the facts on:

üëç what has improved
‚ö† what needs to get better
‚û°Ô∏è what are we doing to improve things?

Read it here: https://t.co/EwoqTKFeUE
#WaterQuality #WaterCompanies

Just 6 months after admitting to 8,400 pollution incidents in court @SouthernWater still manage to top the 2019 polluter in chief scoreboard.

What's clear is the @EnvAgency has no control over this company and even clearer, it is now time for @Ofwat to revoke SW's licence. https://t.co/1KqXjd6XYE

Was a great moment to watch this yesterday - moments where the progress is obvious are always a highlight of working on projects like this! 
@The_RRC @Trent_R_Trust @EnvAgencyMids #conservationist #riverrestoration #staffsSUNRISE https://t.co/QVQ3sfgZoa

Listen to my interview with @AmosAnnabel on @BBCNorthampton this morning RE the traveller encampment at Pineham Locks. 

The clean up operation now begins. I'll be working closely with Cllr @pinder_chauhan, @NorthamptonBC & @EnvAgency to ensure rubbish is cleared from the site.üëç https://t.co/vWbn4lLZKZ

As a little contrast everyday water companies leak 2,954,000,000 litres of water from their underinvested, under repaired, faulty, leaky pipes.

Yep that's 1,078,210,000,000 litres of water per year stolen from our rivers.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/RkJP0KAsoX

Another day another @EnvAgency failure.

Four out of nine water companies in England are now rated as poor when it comes to pollution, the worst result since 2011.

For how much longer I wonder will @MPGeorgeEustice tolerate the incompetence?

https://t.co/X05iHf0Lxu
The @EnvAgency's report into the environmental performance of water companies is released today. You can read the press release, my foreword and the full report here:  https://t.co/mwr4EUcpjm

tweets.text:
With the forecast of widespread & persistent heavy rain across the #Midlands this weekend we're getting ready for a risk of #flood, but are you?

Check your flood risk, sign up for free flood warnings & keep up to date at https://t.co/Yu9SYkYtrI or call Floodline on 0345 988 1188 https://t.co/zi1MDrZbJQ

Work continues on the lock in Boston. 

The chamber has been emptied of water so a full assessment could take place. 

Any necessary maintenance is now being carried out before the lock is re-filledüëç #Lincolnshire #Flood https://t.co/vsh18V0EMB

Four out of nine water companies are falling short of expected environmental standards, according to new @EnvAgency figures which show that pollution incidents rose to the highest number for five years.

https://t.co/tldUJFw2nE

New figures show #water company #pollution incidents rose from 1,863 in 2018 to 2,204 in 2019. 

Anglian, Southern, South West & Northumbrian Water all rated poor by @EnvAgency, putting the #25YearEnvironmentPlan & ecological recovery at risk.

https://t.co/WCsN6fStKk https://t.co/bHhT3FoqXm

High winds and heavy rain could cause surface water and river flooding over the weekend. Do not try to drive through floodwater. Be prepared. For the latest updates see
https://t.co/G0SjP0XBX4, or call Floodline on 0345 988 1188.

@kingpeterking @MariaHerlihyEA @RomneyWeir @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @wifo_ea @Ang_WaterwaysEA I always thought it was fine to stay in the middle of the channel and move to the right when encountering oncoming boats.  Some edges are shallow so centre is safer.  Obviously the move to the right is critical!

Storm Alex will be coming from the south over the weekend Be Prepared.  We are expecting a wet weekend.
@EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/o2eNcoa25w

Field teams continuing to be prepared for the incoming  #StormAlex ,grills cleared of blockages at #Cranleigh #TeamEa .‚Å¶@EnvAgencySE‚Å© ‚Å¶@MarkHill03‚Å© ‚Å¶@wifo_ea‚Å©  ‚Å¶@sarahchareEA‚Å© ‚Å¶@TobyWillisonEA‚Å© ‚Å¶@johncurtinEA‚Å© https://t.co/AdrSqLQkzD

tweets.text: The destruction of England's waterways by our privatised water companies and the @EnvAgency's complicity is a scandal. If you are at all into conservation, nature, wild swimming, fishing, walking, boating etc please consider following and amplifying @Feargal_Sharkey  ( yes him!) https://t.co/pWevT3kFpG

tweets.text: Water #Pollution now getting the attention it deserves in British media & customers willing to pay but who could tell by the level of progress that the race has truly started? https://t.co/s5I5WrSTHR @EnvAgency @theriverstrust @AnglianWater @WaterREast @tomjennings @Bee_anchor

Sadly #flood #forecast for the weekend has worsened. Low likelihood of significant impacts from surface water & river. @EnvAgencyNW prep work continues. #BePrepared #floodaware #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/YYPj5C5R15

#Incident preparedness ,Field teams carrying out flood runs today removing debris #Haslemere at the station and at the park in preparation of #StormAlex .#TeamEA.‚Å¶@EnvAgencySE‚Å© ‚Å¶@MarkHill03‚Å© ‚Å¶@wifo_ea‚Å© ‚Å¶@johncurtinEA‚Å© ‚Å¶@TobyWillisonEA‚Å© https://t.co/cZHu9gFdp9

urls.description: Global Used Trucks and Parts Exports Keltruck Limited are active in the used truck export market, exporting quality used Scania vehicles & parts across the globe. Keltruck hold a comprehensive stock of used vehicles ‚Äì all available for export ‚Äì at West Bromwich, Newark and Cross

tweets.text:
Stark warning from @EnvAgency to several water companies as environmental performance fails to improve

- total number of pollution incidents has increased

https://t.co/zAo8oRRgfm

Water firms in England criticised over rising environmental pollution 

 - @EnvAgency says pollution from nine companies at worst level in five years

Story by @sandralaville 
https://t.co/KgI7WR2K9Z

@CarlCarljoynes @ScaniaGroup @ScaniaUK @RustyWarn @Andrew_Bentley @RustyWarner @Comm_Motor @MitchGough @davemor66816340 @pagietheyounger @anthonysmeed @andrew_long67 @RussKelly71 @RWKeltruck @SFletch8 @adam_freezer @RussBarnes84 @Motor_Transport @TRATON_GROUP @EnvAgency @GREATBritain @tradegovuk @tradegovuk_WM https://t.co/R8Ec7EbDtu
